title: Requires a school nurse to be on the premises during school hours in any school having an enrollment of 100 pupils or more
summary: Requires a school nurse to be on the premises during school hours in any school having an enrollment of 100 pupils or more.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1527

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 10, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. COLTON, CYMBROWITZ, PHEFFER, BOYLAND -- Multi-
         Sponsored by -- M. of A.   ABBATE,  COOK,  HOOPER,  LANCMAN,  MILLMAN,
         PEOPLES-STOKES,  J. RIVERA,  TITUS, TOWNS -- read once and referred to
         the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to  requiring  nurses  in
         public schools

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph b of subdivision 2 of section 902 of  the  educa-
    2  tion  law,  as amended by chapter 501 of the laws of 2005, is amended to
    3  read as follows:
    4    b. Any such board or trustees may employ one or  more  school  nurses,
    5  who  shall  be  registered  professional nurses, as well as other health
    6  professionals, as may be required. Such registered  professional  nurses
    7  and  other  health professionals shall aid the director of school health
    8  services of the district and shall perform such duties, including health
    9  instruction for the benefit of the public schools as may  be  prescribed
   10  by  such  board or trustees, in compliance with each such health profes-
   11  sional's practice act.   SUCH REGISTERED  PROFESSIONAL  NURSE  SHALL  BE
   12  REQUIRED TO BE ON THE PREMISES DURING SCHOOL HOURS IN ANY SCHOOL WITH AN
   13  ENROLLMENT OF ONE HUNDRED OR MORE PUPILS.
   14    S  2.  This  act  shall  take  effect  on  the first of September next
   15  succeeding the date on which it shall have become a law.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05850-01-1
